mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( id, board_category_id, title, content, user_id, img_url ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardCategoryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate, user_id AS userId, img_url AS imgUrl, like_count AS likeCount, view_count AS viewCount FROM board WHERE id = #{boardId} AND is_deleted = 0
